Description: AWS Cloud Formation Template for deploying Informatica PowerCenter Version 10.1.1 on EC2 RHEL7.0 instances. This template uses an existing VPC and two Private and Public subnets. It deploys an Instance of Amazon RDS with Oracle Database on the Private Subnet. The Informatica PowerCenter Instanes are deployed in the Public Subnet. The template deploys resources over two Availability Zones.

DBSubnetIDs.Description: Select two subnet IDs each from a different region in the VPC chosen above (such as: us-west-1b, us-west-1c)

RDSDatabaseName.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 4-20
RDSDatabaseName.Description: Database Name for RDS Instance. Default value is InfaDB

DatabasePassword.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 8-18
DatabasePassword.Description: Password for the Amazon RDS database account. Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 8-18

DatabasePasswordConfirm.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 8-18
DatabasePasswordConfirm.Description: Password for the Amazon RDS database account.

DatabaseType.Description: The type of database to use in Amazon RDS. Currently, you can only use Oracle

DatabaseUsername.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 4-20
DatabaseUsername.Description: Username for the Amazon RDS database account

EncryptionKeyPhrase.ConstraintDescription: It should be 8 to 20 characters long, at least one uppercase letter at least one lowercase letter-at least one number Does not contain spaces
EncryptionKeyPhrase.Description: The text string used as the base word from which to generate an encryption key for the Informatica domain.

InformaticaDomainName.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 4-20

InformaticaNodeName.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 4-20
InformaticaNodeName.Description: Prefix for the Nodes in Informatica Domain. Node number will be the suffix for the nodes. Eg InfaNode1, InfaNode2

InformaticaDomainUsername.ConstraintDescription: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore are allowed. Should begin with an alphabet. The value must be 4-20

InformaticaDomainPassword.ConstraintDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters in length. Should contain at least one special character, number, upper-case and lower-case character. Double quote(") and dollar($) is not allowed
InformaticaDomainPassword.Description: Password for the Informatica Domain. Password must be at least 8 characters in length. Should contain at least one special character, number, upper-case and lower-case character. Double quote(") and dollar($) is not allowed

InformaticaDomainPasswordConfirm.ConstraintDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters in length. Should contain at least one special character, number, upper-case and lower-case character. Double quote(") and dollar($) is not allowed

KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable external access to the Informatica Domain

NumberOfPowerCenterInstances.Description: Number of PowerCenter Nodes. Each node runs on one EC2 Instance

PowerCenterInstanceType.Description: Instance Type for Informatica Domain. Default is c4.2xlarge

PublicSubnet1ID.Description: Select a publicly accessible subnet ID located in Availability Zone 1 for the Informatica Domain

PublicSubnet2ID.Description: Select a publicly accessible subnet ID located in Availability Zone 2 for the Informatica Domain

RemoteAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/x
RemoteAccessCIDR.Description: Allowed CIDR block for external access to the Informatica Domain

VPCID.Description: Which VPC should this be deployed to?

LicenseKey.Description: *Optional Argument*. Provide a PUBLIC S3 link for the License Key file. Leave blank to go ahead without the Licence Key

CreateEFS.Description: Create shared storage for High Availability. Default value is Yes. Shared storage is created only if it is available in your region

EnableEIP.Description: Assign Elastic IPs to Instances. Default value is Yes

Assertions.AssertDescription: All subnets must in the VPC
Informatica Domain Passwords do not match

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet Group for Informatica PowerCenter RDS Database

Properties.GroupDescription: Informatica PowerCenter RDS Database Security Group
Enable RDP and within VPC traffic

PowerCenterAgentIP.Description: Elastic IP address of the PowerCenter instance

InstanceID.Description: Instance ID of the newly created EC2 Master instance

AvailabilityZone.Description: Availability Zone of the newly created EC2 instances

PublicDNS.Description: Public DNS name of the newly created EC2 Master instance
